tables.name: webmodules_website
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE webmodules_website (wmsiteid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,domain TEXT NOT NULL)

tables.name: webmodules_aliases
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE webmodules_aliases (wmaliasid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, website INT NOT NULL REFERENCES webmodules_website(wmsiteid), alias TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE)

tables.name: webmodules_siteids
tables.sql: CREATE TABLE webmodules_siteids (wmsiteidid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,season INT REFERENCES season(seasonid),website INT REFERENCES webmodules_website(wmsiteid),siteid TEXT NOT NULL,UNIQUE(season,website) ON CONFLICT REPLACE)
